com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.tracker

Interface TrackerOAuth

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tracker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AniList, GenericTrackerOAuth

    public interface TrackerOAuth
extends Tracker
    A Tracker with OAuth-based authentication.
    See Also:
    Tracker, com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.tracker

    • Method Detail

      • fullAuthUrl

        java.lang.String fullAuthUrl()
        Generate a user-friendly URL for the user to authorize with the tracker.
        Returns:
        the full auth url

      • generateToken

        void generateToken(java.lang.String code)
            throws NotImplementedException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Generate the user's access token.

        If this method successfully retrieves a valid token, Tracker.isAuthenticated() will be true.

        Parameters:
        code - a verification code given by the user after authorization
        Throws:
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this tracker
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when generating

      • getToken

        java.lang.String getToken()
        Get the user's access token.

        Returns null if the user is not authenticated.

        Returns:
        the user's access token, or null

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Represents this Tracker as a string.
        Specified by:
        toString in interface Tracker
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the user-friendly representation of this Tracker
